section.div: SKILLS FOR LEARNING AND SCHOOL LIFE

div.label: Can he concentrate on one activity?: *
Does he finish the something started?: *
Can he separate of the parents?: *
How is the relation with others children?: *
Who does he prefer to play with?: *
What motivated your choice for this school?: *
